column6: BRIDE OF THE PANTHER PART 3  T'Challa's heart -- and a seat on the Wakandan throne -- is Storm's, if she'll just accept his hand in marriage.  Question is, does she want it?
column8: | penciller (cover):Olivier Coipel | penciller:Scot Eaton | letterer:Randy Gentile | writer:Reginald Hudlin | inker:Klaus Janson | colorist:Dean White
